column2: Ven.  Pandith  Thumbulle  Sri  Dhammananda  Thero  to  the  1 st  Respondent
certifying that the temple in question belongs to the Asgiriya Chapter.
With this evidence it  is  very clear that there is a dispute in relation to
the fact whether this temple belongs to the Malwatta Chapter or the Asgiriya
Mahanayaka  of the  Malwatta  Chapter  before  coming

column1: There  is  no  evidence  to  show  that  the  1 st  Respondent  has  held  a  formal

column2: inquiry  by  calling  witnesses  but  he  has  called  for  the  observations  of the
Most Ven. Mahanayaka Thero of the Malwatta Chapter.
